sathiyakata passe wunath thamanta eda una thuwale atha gala baladdi santhosayak misak wedanawak nam danune na bindu lathata.‚Äùhapoyi aarachchiya chandikamata katha kolata apuchchage sadde ahila diwwa misakka patan gaththu wade ahawara karannawath ninawwak thibba ekakya.aayeth sarayak eda winda sapa kakul deka assata labeya kiyala hithana wunnath ee tike nam bindu lathage aasawa ishta wune na,mathak wena kota kakul mula theth karan dore galayana aasawa ee widiyatama thiyenna arala bindulathata hitha hanga ganna wune puruwe karumekatada manda henata kada path wechcha rilaw nisa kiyala bindu lathata hitha hada ganna wuna.kohoma wunath amma issaraha apuchcha ekka ehema innath bindu lathage manapayak thibune na.eeth game loku ganu lamissiyo kipa denekma unge maha ekalath ekka pawul kana withthiya nam bindu latha danan wunna.eeth ehemath puluwana pawul kanna.bada gabbara wela kawuruwath diga geniyanna katha nokaloth apuchcha ekkama hamadama inna hari nathnam balaya tikira ekka badda kelawara henak hadagena wahan wenna hari bindu lathage hithe hiniyata hinayak dalulawa.
